testcase.classname: feature to test Jiva design Style Initial Details screen functionality
testcase.name: To Test the Style Initial details screen
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to Login page...........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on the Woven Module...............................................passed Then click on the Merchandising Module......................................passed And click on the Style Initail Details screen...............................passed When Click on the Styles Expansion..........................................passed And Select IPO/Style........................................................passed And Click on the Add combo button...........................................passed Given Enter the data in Combo1..............................................passed And Click on the Delete Icon1...............................................passed And Click on the Add Garment type button....................................passed And Click on the Garment type field.........................................passed And Select the Garment type.................................................passed And Click on the Submit Order details button................................passed And Verify the Alert msg....................................................passed
